instructions.description: Open a new browser tab and go to Vercel (vercel.com). Log in using your GitHub account.
On the Vercel dashboard, click 'Add New' or 'Import Project'.
Find and select the 'nexible-os-demo' repository you just created.
Vercel will auto-detect the configuration. Click the 'Deploy' button.

result: Vercel will provide a public, shareable URL for your Nexible MVP.
